sourcesContent:
import { Container } from '../style'; const TagprosParents101 = () => { return (

What is Tagpros

We give teachers a platform to design their courses and post them on our website. In order to broaden the scope of the teachers' skills, we also assist in advertising the lessons they design. Our main goal is to develop small-group, interactive, live online classrooms that will undoubtedly improve your kids' educational experiences. Numerous subjects are available at Tagpros, including music, science, math, and many others.

 

Becoming a member at Tagpros

You only need to{' '} create an account {' '} on our website to join Tagpros. Make sure to create a family account so you may register your kids for classes. If you choose not to sign up using Gmail or Facebook, you will be prompted to verify your email address. Once you have registered, simply{' '} log into your account {' '} to start browsing for classes.{' '}

 

Taking Classes

According to the teacher's preferences and the price guidelines offered by our platform, each class is priced differently. Our lesson fees typically range from 3 to 20 USD per session. Payments for our class are currently made through Paypal.

 

Preparing for your Learnerâ€™s Classes

For our live classes, we use{' '} Jitsi {' '} as our live video platform to facilitate the discussions. For this, you will need to have a webcam, microphone, and a reliable internet connection. To learn more about Jitsi, we encourage you to watch this video. However, certain teachers may require certain materials for the class to be maximized.

 

Contact{' '} customercare@tagpros.us {' '} if you have any questions or concerns. We are always happy to help.

); }; export default TagprosParents101;
